title: Bug / Glitch / Hotfix Ranked Que Dodge
body:
Today I had dodged two normal games, got into a ranked game in which someone says "gg, i can't adc." So i decided to dodge the que for fear they may not be very good at any position (which is my right / choice,) so when I dodge this game I received a 10 LP loss when the games I had previously dodged were not similar game types, (ex. Normal vs. Ranked.) 

So after having said this I feel that this should be fixed because it does not make a bit of sense to have these dodges shared with ranked matches.

Thoughts everyone?

replies.body: Oh no someone in my game is trolling, god forbid I dodge to prevent myself the stress of a 30 min troll game. Please take away my lp

Dodging ranked has brought about LP loss for a long time now. It's nothing new. Riot didn't want people dodging and dodging over and over again just because their team-comp they got wasn't LCS #proplays worthy.
Top of the page, "Game Info," "Summoner's code," Second paragraph of the first section.
don't dodge. you deserve every loss for cheesing it.
